ygData.subject: illusion cast on others?
ygData.msgSnippet: i read this on baelish s site: Bukaru our friendly neighbourhood Test Server reporter has informed us that if you cast illusion on someone has has been shrunk
ygData.messageBody:
i read this on baelish's site:

"Bukaru our friendly neighbourhood Test Server reporter has informed us
that if you cast illusion on someone
has has been shrunk it will cancel the shrink spell and give them
the illusion. Yet, if you cast shrink on
someone who is illusioned it will stack. Problem being: When
illusion wears off so does the shrink, and if you
recast the illusion it cancels the shrink (obviously). "

so i am taking it to mean you can cast illusions on others... what's that
all about?

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 26th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
